name: Trump International Hotel And Tower (Panama)
description: Ethics experts say their fear has been realized as Trump faces one of his most consequential conflicts of interest yet: The Panamanian government has pledged to investigate the Trump Organization for resisting eviction from the Trump International Hotel and Tower. That dispute arose after the hotels majority owner cancelled the Trump Organizations management contract for the hotel.
